si.title: වාහන ආනයනය සම්බන්ධව ගැසට් ගැටළුව
body_lines: ගැසට් නිවේදනය නිකුත් කර ඇත්තේ මුදල්, සැලසුම් හා ආර්ථික සංවර්ධන අමාත්ය අනුර කුමාර දිසානායකගේ අත්සනින් ය.. (අ)

en.title: Gazette Issue in connection with vehicle import
body_lines: The Gazette Notification has been issued with the signature of the Minister of Finance, Planning and Economic Development President Anura Kumara Dissanayake.. (A)

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the Gazette issue related to vehicle import in approximately 200 characters:

"Minister Anura Kumara Dissanayake signed a Gazette Notification regarding vehicle imports. This notification addresses key aspects of importing vehicles, including regulations, procedures, and any changes to existing policies."
